enb_long_title: Third session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action and first part of the sixth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex 1 Parties under the Kyoto Protocol to the UNFCCC
sentences: AWG-LCA Chair Luiz Machado (Brazil) opened the session, emphasizing the need for parties to focus on concrete ideas and proposals, and to identify common views.
Chair Machado introduced documents on the summary of views expressed at AWG-LCA 2 ( FCCC/AWGLCA/2008/11 ) and a scenario note on the third session ( FCCC/AWGLCA/2008/10 ).
